title: Publish Bhojpur Classic marketing site live (production deployment)

requirements.text: Publish the current Bhojpur Classic single-page marketing site live as a production deployment on the Internet Computer so it is accessible via a public URL.

quotes: O am okay with the version now can you publish it live

acceptanceCriteria: A production deployment is performed (not just a local/preview build).
A public URL is provided that loads the Bhojpur Classic marketing page successfully over HTTPS.
Core interactions work on the live site (navigation scroll links and tel: click-to-call links for +91 878-9514659).
No placeholder/preview-only references are present in the live deployment output.

constraints: Keep the existing single-actor backend architecture (backend/main.mo) unchanged unless strictly required for deployment.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other frontend immutablePaths; compose existing components instead if changes are needed.
nonGoals: Adding new site sections (e.g., contact form) or changing existing marketing copy/design.
Introducing new backend functionality or persistent storage.
